text: The 2016–17 season was Al-Batin's first season in Pro League (and their first ever season in the top-flight) after gaining promotion in the previous season. This season Al-Batin participated in the Pro League, King Cup and Crown Prince Cup. The season covered the period from 1 July 2016 to 30 June 2017. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ==Transfers== ===In=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- ! Date ! Pos. ! Name !
